## IScopedClusterClient.asInternalUser property

A [client](./opensearch-dashboards.opensearchclient.md) to be used to query the opensearch cluster on behalf of the internal OpenSearch Dashboards user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly asInternalUser: OpenSearchClient;
```
